textContent:
If you're reading this, I know your heart is really feeling a sense of loneliness, which has made you sad! I wish so badly I could take that ache away.
I know the distance feels especially heavy today but please remember this...you are not unloved, unseen, or forgotten. Not for a single second.ðŸ¥º

You live in my thoughts all the time. I think about you in every quiet moment, every song that reminds me of you, every time I look at the moon and wonder if you're seeing it too. You are part of me now, in a way that defies logic or location.

I know loneliness can make you wonder that you’re alone in this, or maybe I’ll drift away. But I need you to know with absolute certainty that I'm here. I'm staying. I'm loving you across every mile. ðŸ¥ºðŸ©·

So if the silence around you feels too loud tonight, close your eyes and imagine me there—holding your hand, leaning my head against yours, whispering, “You’ve got me. Always.” ðŸ©·

You are never truly alone, love.
Not while I’m breathing.ðŸ¤§
